text: drb allah mathalana lakum -ayha almushrikun -mn anfskm: hal lakum min ebydkm wa'iimayikum man ysharkkm fi rzqkm, wtrwn 'anakum wa'iiaahum mtsawwn fyh, takhafunahum kama takhafun al'ahrar alshuraka' fi mqasmt amwalkm? 'iinakum ln tardawa bdhlk, fkyf tardawn bdhlk fi janb allah bi'ana tajealuu lah shrykana min khlqh? wbmthl hdha albayan nbyin albrahyn walhjj li'ashab aleqwl alsalimat aladhin yntfewn bha
